name: labsync-ai-root
description: Root package to manage LabSync AI Budgeting System - Complete Automation

scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix shared --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix agents --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix mcp-server --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix backend --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix frontend --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build:libs: npm run build --prefix shared && npm run build --prefix agents && npm run build --prefix mcp-server
scripts.dev: npm run check:mongodb && npm run prepare:env && npm run build:libs && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run prepare:env && npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run prepare:env && npm run dev --prefix frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run prepare:env && npm run build:libs && npm run build --prefix agents && npm run build --prefix mcp-server && npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
